website_summaries.verdict: Despite a crisp display and a slim build, the MSI GP62X Leopard Pro's performance lags behind other midrange gaming laptops.
pros: Crisp display, relatively thin and light

customer_reviews.title: Ameizing!
customer_reviews.text: I got this new laptop today and I love it! My old laptop ran my games (Overwatch) on the lowest setting with difficulty but this one can do my games on the highest settings with ease. I definitely recommend it and you can get a free app on your phone to look at your laptop features. I love it and it is definitely going to be put to use!
customer_reviews.author: Graham Farmer

customer_reviews.title: Games? Easy!
customer_reviews.text: What can I say? It does exactly what it says on the tin. Its handling games like they're absolutely nothing, it's fast and the screen is brilliant. One thing though, it's a fingerprint magnet! Other than that, it's awesome :D
customer_reviews.author: Edward Reid

customer_reviews.title: Terrible item and expensive for cheap gaming laptop
customer_reviews.text: Terrible computer, which malfunctioned in a week from internal programming issues. As soon as I turned it on things were not working 1 day in. Don't buy one it completely died in 4 days to a blue dead screen. I build computer's and this was rubbish!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very flawed.
customer_reviews.text: Build solid enough, fast, screen though is one of the flimsiest I've seen. SSD drive is too small. Three months after purchase the SATA drive failed and couldn't be initialised. Oh and a very small tear appeared on the screen.
customer_reviews.author: Gaudd Almighty

customer_reviews.title: Worth buying for gaming
customer_reviews.text: It's a good laptop taken how much it costs. It can run most games made in 2015-2016 without much problem. Ultra cooling option that this lapotp has makes it that it rarely overheats and because the windows boot-up files are in ssd instead of hdd it boots up quicker
customer_reviews.author: Erikas S.

customer_reviews.title: laptop works. However I've had 2 of these laptops ...
customer_reviews.text: laptop works. However I've had 2 of these laptops now due to issues with the product and both times on delivery have had issues with the build. The laptop is prone to issues with the ports and mouse/power buttons.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would highly recommend the MSI laptops
customer_reviews.text: I'm using for almost 6 months, still very new and fast, I didn't have any problem, I would highly recommend the MSI laptops.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando Sivelli

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It’s good but the battery just stay to 4 hours
customer_reviews.author: Mohammed

customer_reviews.title: Very fast
customer_reviews.text: Very fast, takes 2-3 seconds to arrive at the desktop (ready to use) from pressing the power on button. Works well, I think it needs 16Gb Ram though instead of 8Gb, so will make that upgrade, the 1050 Graphics card is good enough for most games, yes I'd recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Enigma

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Reviewing on behalf of my son because he's too busy gaming on it! Up and running straight away, son able to load and play games immediately. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Moominmamma

customer_reviews.title: Fast, great to use and superb value.
customer_reviews.text: This is so much better than I expected. Considering what is inside the case, it is superb value. The display is excellent. The performance is fantastic - in part because of the SSD. The only short coming is what I expected for the price - limited battery life - but that is not too much of a issue for how I use it. It would have been nice to have a bigger SSD but that is just me being greedy :-) Thoroughly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: L J Bond

customer_reviews.title: Horrible, not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Horrible,not worth the money..after few weeks of using it started to freeze whenever I played a game..absolutely joke..not happy
customer_reviews.author: Ilie Andrei

customer_reviews.title: Wonder if the machines performance deteriorates over time but as for now I’m a happy man.
customer_reviews.text: my first owned gaming laptop. It exceeded all my expectations since I can run a game on high graphics with chrome tabs and music in the background with no lagg issues at all. Wonder if the machines performance deteriorates over time but as for now I’m a happy man. :)
customer_reviews.author: adam sajjad

product_meta.title: MSI GP62 7RD (Leopard) 011UK 15.6" Gaming Laptop - (Kabylake Core i7, 8 GB RAM, 128GB SSD, 1TB HDD, GTX 1050, Windows 10) + Hecate Gaming Backpack
feature_bullets: Compatible to protect a 15" to 17" Laptop
Made with durable polyester materials, two large compartments and several additional mesh pockets
Featuring robust, red zips and trim, exterior zip front pocket for quick access
A sturdy top-load carry handle and rear adjustable straps with heavy duty shoulder-pads

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars20 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
